name: A
line: How can I help you? This is Muthu Curry Restaurant.

name: B
line: I am looking for an Indian restaurant in the west end of Cambridge.

name: A
line: Of course there are 6 results for Indian restaurants in the west. what price range are you looking for?

name: B
line: What selection on the menu?

name: A
line: We have many popular Indian food on the menu.

name: B
line: I do not have a preference. So surprise me!

name: A
line: I recommend cocum as they are good.

name: B
line: Nice! I would like to make a reservation for 3 on Thursday at 11:30.

name: A
line: Booking was successful. The table will be reserved for 15 minutes. Reference number is FGM5WP19.

name: B
line: Can I also book a train please?

name: A
line: What time would you like the train to leave?

name: B
line: The train needs to leave from peterborough and arrive at cambridge by 08:30.

name: A
line: Is there a time you would like to leave by?

name: B
line: No. Just Thursday is the day I need it.

name: A
line: There are five trains leaving Peterborough and going to Cambridge on Thursday. The last one leaves at 7:19 and arrives at 8:09. Is this one you would like to book?

name: B
line: That is perfect. Though I do not want to book it just yet. Can you give me the travel time. price. and train ID please?

name: A
line: The train ID is TR7094. It takes 50 minutes to get from Peterborough to Cambridge. The price is 16.50 pounds. Is there anything else?

name: B
line: That is all I needed. thank you!

name: A
line: You are welcome. have a lovely day!

name: B
line: I am looking for a restaurant serving malaysian food.

name: A
line: There are no Malaysian restaurants in this area.

name: B
line: I am also looking for a restaurant serving asian oriental food.

name: A
line: I have found several restaurants serving Asian Oriental food. What area of town do you prefer?

name: B
line: I do not care.

name: A
line: Might I suggest the Dojo Noodle Bar. They are located in the centre of town and they are cheap. Would you like their phone number?

name: B
line: Yes. and their address too.

name: A
line: Dojo Noodle bar is located at 40210 Millers Yard City Centre and their phone number is 01223 363471. Is there anything else that I can help you with today?

name: B
line: What is the postcode?

name: A
line: The postcode for dojo noodle bar is CB17DY.

name: B
line: No. that will be all. Thank you and goodbye!

name: A
line: You are welcome. Good bye and have a great day!

name: B
line: I am looking for college attractions in the centre.

name: A
line: We have 13 colleges in the centre. and most have free entry. such as Christ's College.

name: B
line: Great. can you give me the phone number and postcode of Christ's college?

name: A
line: Of course. the phone number is 01223334900 and the post code is cb23bu.

name: B
line: Also want to find someplace to eat. Want to be in the cheap price range and in the same area of town.

name: A
line: How About Chinese?

name: B
line: I was thinking more on the lines of afghan food. Do you have any listings for that?

name: A
line: I am afraid I don't. Would you like to try a different area or cuisine?

name: B
line: Could you check for mediterranean please?

name: A
line: The Gardenia is a Mediterranean restaurant in the centre of town. would you like to make a reservation?

name: B
line: I will need it for three. at noon. on Thursday.

name: A
line: I am sorry. But the Gardenia does not have any openings for noon on Thursday for 3 people. Would you like for me check a different time for you?

name: B
line: How about at 11:00?

name: A
line: Booking was successful. The table will be reserved for 15 minutes. Reference number is RBZGP3RX. Is there anything else I can help you with?

name: B
line: Thank you. Good Bye.

name: A
line: You are welcome. Have a nice day!

name: A
line: Shogun Restaurant.

name: B
line: I would like to make a dinner reservation.

name: A
line: Of course! what evening will you be joining us on?

name: B
line: We will need the reservation for Tuesday night.

name: A
line: What time would you like the reservation for?

name: B
line: We would prefer 7:00 or 7:30.

name: A
line: How many people will you need the reservation for?

name: B
line: There will be 4 of us.

name: A
line: Fine. I can seat you at 7:00 on Tuesday. if you would kindly give me your name.

name: B
line: Thank you. The last name is Foster.

name: A
line: See you at 7:00 this Tuesday. Mr. Foster.

name: B
line: Thank you so much. I appreciate your help.

name: A
line: This is Shogun Restaurant.

name: B
line: Hello. I need to make a dinner reservation.

name: A
line: Can you tell me what night you will be coming?

name: B
line: We will be coming to your restaurant on Tuesday night.

name: A
line: What time will you be dining with us?

name: B
line: Our first choice would be 7:00. or perhaps 7:30.

name: A
line: How many guests will be in your party?

name: B
line: Four of us will be coming.

name: A
line: Please just give me your name. and at 7:00 on Tuesday we will have a table for you!

name: B
line: Great! Our last name is Foster.

name: A
line: Thank you. Mr. Foster. see you this Tuesday at 7:00.

name: B
line: I look forward to having dinner at your restaurant. Thank you for your help.

name: A
line: Shogun Restaurant of Pasadena.

name: B
line: Hi. could you help me? I need to make a dinner reservation.

name: A
line: I can help you if you can just tell me what evening you like the reservation for.

name: B
line: Tuesday night is when we need the reservation for.

name: A
line: What time do you think that you would like to have dinner?

name: B
line: 7:00 would be best. or maybe 7:30.

name: A
line: How many diners will be in your group?

name: B
line: We need a reservation for four.

name: A
line: I have a table for four available at 7:00. if you would just give me your name.

name: B
line: My last name is Foster. Thank you for the reservation.

name: A
line: Mr. Foster. we will be expecting you this Tuesday at 7:00.

name: B
line: We will be there! Thanks for the help!
